content.p: For information and advice on money issues, funding, scholarships and bursaries, contact Financial Support. Student Services Centre University of Nottingham Cherry Tree Lodge University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD Phone: +44(0) 115 74 86500 Ask a question: Student Enquiries For information on how to pay please refer to the fee regulations Click here for more information about when fees are due and payment methods Prospective students with queries about fees should view the fees pages. For details about who to contact for queries regarding student tuition fees and financial support, please visit our contact us page.
